attributes.long_name: North Station Elevator 910 (Lobby to Forest Hills, Copley & West platform)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, exit the train to Haymarket and return to North Station on an Oak Grove- (Orange Line) or Lechmere-/North Station- (Green Line) bound train. Alternatively, customers may exit at Haymarket, cross New Chardon Street, and travel three-tenths of a mile down Canal Street to North Station at Causeway Street.

properties.name: note
properties.value: Significant barriers exist at station, but customers may be able to board/exit train using mobile lift

attributes.long_name: Haymarket Elevator 907 (Underpass to Oak Grove platform)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, please use Haymarket Elevator 903 to go up to the lobby at Congress Street. \nIf you are transferring to the Green Line, take Haymarket Elevator 903 up to the lobby. At the lobby, take Haymarket Elevator 904 down to the Forest Hills platform. Exit to the left and travel to the end of the platform to use Haymarket Elevator 905 up to the sub level to exit. Turn right and proceed to Haymarket Elevator 906 to reach the Green Line platform.

Alternatively, continue down the passageway towards the Commuter Rail to reach North Station Elevator 731 (passageway to Commuter Rail and TD Garden).\nIf boarding, travel one-tenth of a mile down Canal or Beverly Streets to the North Station entrances on Causeway Street.

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, travel down the passageway and use North Station Elevator 731 to reach Causeway Street. If boarding, exit through the east TD Garden entrance and follow the path to Causeway Street. At Causeway Street, turn right and use North Station Elevator 731 to reach the lobby.

attributes.long_name: North Station Elevator 912 (Orange Line, Green Line lobby to Causeway Street)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, travel down the passageway toward the Commuter Rail and use North Station Elevator 731 (passageway to Causeway Street). Alternatively, pass through the fare gates and walk the full length of the Green Line platform to reach the opposite lobby at Valenti Way. At this lobby, use North Station Elevator 909 (lobby to Valenti Way) to reach the street level. If boarding, cross Causeway Street to use North Station Elevator 731 to reach the lobby.

attributes.long_name: Kenmore Elevator 972 (Park Street & North platform to lobby, busway)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: Customers desiring elevator access to exit the station on the inbound side must continue to Copley or Arlington and transfer to outbound service back to Kenmore. Customers desiring inbound service can use the outbound elevator and take the C- or D-Line one stop and transfer back to inbound service. Please see station personnel for assistance.

properties.name: fee-daily

properties.name: fee-monthly
properties.value: Regular monthly: $340, North End resident: $150, Reverse commute (4 PM - 9 AM): $125

attributes.long_name: Arlington Elevator 962 (Copley & West platform to lobby)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, exit the Green Line at Copley and transfer to inbound service back to Arlington to utilize Arlington Elevator 963. If boarding, use Arlington Elevator 963 to access an inbound train to Park Street and switch to an outbound train.

attributes.long_name: Haymarket Elevator 903 (Oak Grove platform to Congress Street lobby)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting the station, take elevator 906, turn right, and take elevator 905 to the Oak Grove platform. \nIf boarding from the street, use Elevator 904 to the Forest Hills platform, then elevators 905 and 906 to cross under the Orange Line tracks.

properties.name: alternate-service-text

attributes.description: Park Street - Top of stairs between Ashmont/Braintree platform and Government Center & North platform
attributes.name: Park Street

attributes.long_name: North Station Elevator 911 (Oak Grove platform to paid lobby)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, take the Orange Line to Community College and return to North Station on a Forest Hills-bound train and exit using North Station Elevator 910. If boarding, use North Station Elevator 910 to board a Forest Hills-bound train. At Haymarket, switch to an Oak Grove-bound train. \nAlternatively, customers may exit at Haymarket, cross New Chardon Street, and travel three-tenths of a mile down Canal Street to North Station at Causeway Street.
